full_text: Case 22-1426, Document 78, 06/29/2023, 3536039, Page82 of 217 SA-336 Case 1:20-cr-00330-AJN Document 204-3 Filed 04/16/21 Page 336 of 348 By signing this agreement, Epstein asserts and certifies that the above has been read and explained to him. text_blocks.content: By signing this agreement, Epstein asserts and certifies that the above has been read and explained to him. Epstein hereby states that he understands the conditions of this Non-Prosecution Agreement and agrees to comply with them.

additional_notes: The document appears to be a Non-Prosecution Agreement signed by Jeffrey Epstein and his attorneys, with a signature from A. Marie Villafana on behalf of R. Alexander Acosta, United States Attorney.
